column1: Respondent  against  whom  the  statement  of  objection  is  directed.  The  Plaintiff
Appellant  has  preferred  this  appeal  to  get  the  unallotted  portion  allotted  in  his

favour. 
Even  the  lawyers for the 1st  Defendant and  2nd  Defendant had  not asked
that 1/16th  share to be allotted to their clients in  their oral submissions at the end

of trial 
in 
the  lower  Court. 
Both  the  lawyers  have  moved  to  leave  that  1/16th

share  unallotted.
